cgcloud__Unit_of_Measure__c.name: cgcloud__Unit_of_Measure__c
cgcloud__Unit_of_Measure__c.description: Stores the details of the units of measure (logistic unit) of a product.

cgcloud__Is_Consumer_Unit__c.description: Indicates whether the item is a consumer unit.

cgcloud__Is_Order_Unit__c.description: Indicates whether the item is a default order unit.

cgcloud__Is_Price_Unit__c.description: Indicates whether the item is a price unit.

cgcloud__Order_Ability__c.description: Indicates whether the unit of measure can be ordered.

cgcloud__Pieces_per_Smallest_Unit__c.description: Number of pieces of the smallest unit that this unit contains.

cgcloud__Pieces_per_parent_unit__c.description: Number of pieces of this unit of measure that the parent unit of measure contains.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the unit of measure record.

cgcloud__Rounding_Rule__c.description: Defines the rounding rule to be applied for the target unit of measure.

cgcloud__Rounding_Target__c.description: Controls whether the unit of measure is to be considered for rounding quantities.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sequence of unit of measures of a product (from the smallest unit to the largest unit).

cgcloud__Unit_Type__c.description: Type of the unit of measure.

cgcloud__Volume__c.description: Item volume used for complex pricing.

cgcloud__Weight__c.description: Item weight used for complex pricing.
